body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting DineSafe Solutions. My name is Larry Patterson. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Larry, my name is Kelly Washington. I'm feeling a bit nervous because I'm having a privacy issue related to a restaurant.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Kelly. Can you please provide me with the name of the restaurant in question?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kelly. Can you also let me know the date of your visit to Gourmet Haven?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I visited on the fourth of October, two zero two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate that information. To better assist you, could you please describe the specific privacy concern you are experiencing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Well, I noticed that after my visit, I started receiving unsolicited promotional emails, and I'm worried my personal information was shared without my consent.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Kelly. I will look into this matter for you right away. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Larry. I hope we can resolve this soon.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Kelly. Thank you for your time today. We will get back to you shortly with an update. Have a great day!
